contest-event.event-date: April 22, 1946 D Midlands Area (Youth Section) Midlands Area (Youth Section) 50 Test Piece Contest Midlands Area midlands-area-youth-section National Youth Brass Band Championships From 1985 to 1993 this contest was split into North and South Areas. Please refer to the 'Old Contests' section on http://brassbandresults.co.uk/contests/MIDLANDS-AREA/ for the results. Midlands Youth Hereward De Montfort Hall, Leicester, Leicestershire, England, UK 8 bands competed. Dec. 18, 2012, 11:14 a.m. Feb. 7, 2019, 4:26 p.m. 1 Jaguar Land Rover Band Jack Major 2 Sheringham Youth Centre Henry Bishop 3 Leicester Sea and Air Cadets S. J. Anderson 4 Buxton Sea Cadets A.
